channel.title: Blaze-X Server like no other! (317)
channel.description:
Blaze-X is a new server with a lot of developers, coders and updates all of the time. It is the closest server to Near-Reality you will ever find..
It has a stable economy, good donation prices, easy training, everything. You can vote, for rewards twice a day, every 12 hours.
Here are a few pictures.
Here's the quest tab panel. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/vhu5ox.png[/img]
Thieving area, sell the stuff to Miles. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/rhomft.png[/img]
Custom shop area, has been redone. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30ubpyu.png[/img]
Pk Point shop, you can get 200 pk points per day from voting! (Once every 12 hours!) [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/f0673m.png[/img]
Vote point shop, You can get 4 tickets per day from voing! (2 every vote) [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hge2qx.png[/img]
A few bosses! (more are being added, such as Nex) [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/t4xoix.png[/img]
Thank you for looking at my Advertisement for BlazeX, We know not many players on at the moment, but were striving for a better player-base. We have recieved $300+ in donations over the past 3 weeks, and we will continue to stay up. Were looking for you, the players to come join.
This is mostly a pk server, yes, but you can boss, and get rich, fast.
The links are here.
Home Page [url=http://www.blazex.net/]BlazeX RSPS[/url]
Webclient [url=http://www.blazex.net/play/webclient.html]BlazeX Webclient[/url]
Forums [url=http://www.blazex.net/forums/activity.php]Activity Stream - BlazeX -- Forums[/url]
Donation Prices & Items [url=http://www.blazex.net/forums/showthread.php?4-Donation-Prices&highlight=donate]Donation Prices[/url]

item.title: Blaze-X Server like no other! (317)
item.dc:creator: @l11 l
item.description:
@l11 wrote:

I thought “Server like no other”
There are tons of servers with lime and lava
